slickshader

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • slickshader.Shader

  • public class Shader
extends Object
    Class used to use and access shaders without having to deal with all of the fidly openGL bits.
    Author:
    Chronocide (Jeremy Klix)

      • setLoggingDetail

        public static void setLoggingDetail(int detailLevel)
        Sets the number of characters to be returned when printing errors.
        Suggested values are the constants BRIEF, MODERATE, and VERBOSE.
        Parameters:
        detailLevel - number of characters to display for error messages.
